entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -43.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -43.7°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -61
Dewpoint: -48.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill near minus 62. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
